openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: 'OAI Specification in YAML'

paths:

    get:

      description: OK
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ObjectA'
  schemas:
    ObjectA:
      type: object
      properties:
        object_b:
          $ref: 'issue235.spec1.yml#/components/schemas/ObjectD'
